name: Banana Oat Cashew Quick bread Bar
description: Naturally sweet, these bars are great to enjoy anytime of the day. Vegan recipe full of flavor
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup all purpose flour (or spelt or wheat pastry flour)
2-3 Tablespoons cooked Quinoa or any cooked small grain
3 Tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent sweetener
A generous pinch of ginger (nutmeg, cloves and cinnamon powder)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add chopped banana and mash it well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add chopped banana and mash it well.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl mix/whisk the flours and baking powder well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl mix/whisk the flours and baking powder well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water/almond milk, vinegar, sugar, salt, spices to the banana mash and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the water/almond milk, vinegar, sugar, salt, spices to the banana mash and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours and mix till just about combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flours and mix till just about combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop batter on parchment lined or greased 8 inch cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop batter on parchment lined or greased 8 inch cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Even it out and Bake at preheated 360 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Even it out and Bake at preheated 360 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.

keywords: banana bread, quick bread, vegan bread
